Conditions Combination: Alphabetical sorting of attribute options in the rule engine
Kombination von Bedingungen: Alphabetical sorting of attribute options in the rule engine

Conditions Combination: If enabled, will forcefully sort select and multiselect attributes' option labels alphabetically when displaying them in the rule engine used by Optimizers and Virtual Categories. Useful if you have product attributes with very long list of options.
Kombination von Bedingungen: If enabled, will forcefully sort select and multiselect attributes' option labels alphabetically when displaying them in the rule engine used by Optimizers and Virtual Categories. Useful if you have product attributes with very long list of options.
